title: Anna Soubry – 2022 Comments on Government’s Plan to Send Asylum Seekers to Rwanda
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Anna Soubry, the former Conservative MP for Broxtowe, on Twitter on 14 April 2022.
content:
This is a grotesque plan. Announced today for no other reason than to save the political skin of law breaking liar #BorisJohnson It’s dog whistle politics at its worst. Utterly ashamed at what our country has become. #RefugeesWelcome
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance

  ESA
 ]: Employment and Support Allowance
